txt.en: 'We will end this Abomination menace once and for all!'
Blaire has been defeated
You have stepped inside Knotfist's hut
You have saved the Abominations, ending the nightmare
You have accompanied Blaire to Lhan Colvarn to put and end to the Abomination threat and their leader, Knotfist.
You have killed Knotfist, ending the nightmare
Blaire has been defeated!
'The deed is done. For better or for worse, we have dealt with these Abominations. Let us leave here and return to camp. We will talk at greater length there.'
Speak with Blaire before continuing.
'You have done well to clear out a large portion of this village.\n\n'We must end this menace now. The Abominations must cease to exist.'
Enter Knotfist's hut.
The time to end the nightmare of the Abominations has come. Finish what has been started.
'Are you ready to end the terror of the Abominations and kill their leader? Knotfist will be in the cellar of the largest hut. He rarely shows his face.'
'You have done well to clear out a large portion of this camp. We must end this menace now. The Abominations must cease to exist.'
Having dealt with the Abominations, speak to Blaire again.
Talk to Blaire
'I will fight with you, [placeholder]! We will smite them all.'
Follow Blaire through the camp
Enter Knotfist's hut
'We can still save these people. It is not their fault they are like this.'
End the nightmare of the Abominations
Instance: Ending the Nightmare
